Package se.arkalix.net.http.client

Interface HttpClientConnection

  • public interface HttpClientConnection
    Connection, established via a HttpClient, useful for sending HTTP requests to a single remote socket address.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.security.cert.Certificate[] certificateChain()  
      Future<?> close()
      Attempts to close the connection.
      boolean isLive()  
      boolean isSecure()  
      java.net.InetSocketAddress localSocketAddress()  
      java.net.InetSocketAddress remoteSocketAddress()  
      Future<HttpClientResponse> send​(HttpClientRequest request)
      Sends given request to HTTP service represented by this HttpClientConnection.
      Future<HttpClientResponse> sendAndClose​(HttpClientRequest request)
      Sends given request to HTTP service represented by this HttpClientConnection, awaits either a response or an error, closes this connection and then completes the returned Future with the resulting response or error.

    • Method Detail

      • remoteSocketAddress

        java.net.InetSocketAddress remoteSocketAddress()
        Returns:
        Address of host reachable via this connection.

      • localSocketAddress

        java.net.InetSocketAddress localSocketAddress()
        Returns:
        Local network interface bound to this connection.

      • certificateChain

        java.security.cert.Certificate[] certificateChain()
        Returns:
        Certificate chain associated with host reachable via this connection.
        Throws:
        NotSecureException - If the connection is not secure.

      • isLive

        boolean isLive()
        Returns:
        true only if this connection can be used to send requests to its remote peer.

      • isSecure

        boolean isSecure()
        Returns:
        true only if this is an HTTPS connection.

      • send

        Future<HttpClientResponse> send​(HttpClientRequest request)
        Sends given request to HTTP service represented by this HttpClientConnection.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP request to send.
        Returns:
        Future of HttpClientResponse.

      • sendAndClose

        Future<HttpClientResponse> sendAndClose​(HttpClientRequest request)
        Sends given request to HTTP service represented by this HttpClientConnection, awaits either a response or an error, closes this connection and then completes the returned Future with the resulting response or error.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP request to send.
        Returns:
        Future of HttpClientResponse.

      • close

        Future<?> close()
        Attempts to close the connection.
        Returns:
        Future completed when closing is done. Can be safely ignored.
